description.narrative: Design quality standardized secondary school digital education content; Test effect of using ICTS in teaching and learning in class rooms; integrate efforts of several ict projects to avoid ineficiencies

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The project started in 2010, and was amended 4 times mainly due to delays in implementation. Sweden stopped 2015 all use of remaining funds until pending audits were finalized. The project had the agreement to be audited by CAG, which also delayed. After finally receiving the CAG audit reports in 2017, discussions were held with CAG, MOEST and the embassy’s controller and program officer to understand findings and recommendations in the CAG financial audit and management letter ended June 2016, and CAG report Clarifications on follow-up on previous years audit recommendations of ICT project June 2018. A stock taking report was done 2015/2016 by the ministry to determine status of the implemention of only one year (2011-2012) to make relevant decision for effective implementation. The conslusions were that: -It was difficult to keep the equipement in safe places, some has been lost or stolen, still the majority of the equipment was there, -More than half of the trained teachers and tutors are in their respective stations except in few schools (Manyara) were only 3 of 9 trained teachers were present. -Students percieved that teahcer were not supporting them in learning ICT, or operate on their own. Some students only had access to the computers on day in the year 2015, and some did inly know how to swith on and off the computers. -Antivirus was not provided/outdated, laoc of electricity. Recommendations made by the ministry were to re-train the teachers, train new tutors and request LGA to allocate funds to suport in procurement of more equipments. Solar panels and better coordination. Sida decided to discontinue, and freeze all the remaining funds at the ministry, until program was audited by the CAG which was ready 2017. The amounts to be paid back have been agreed with the ministry. The remaining to do, is to extend to agreement embassy and MOF (se handover note) just to finalize the repayments to Sida, and after that, be able to close the contribution.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
